Sql.CDATA: IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM SYS.views WHERE name = 'vPACAdjCostAssembly' AND SCHEMA_ID = SCHEMA_ID('dbo') ) DROP VIEW [dbo].[vPACAdjCostAssembly] GO CREATE VIEW vPACAdjCostAssembly AS select cost.CompanyID, cost.FinPeriodID, i.ItemClassID, MAX(isnull(cost.finPtdCostAssemblyOut,0)) as finPtdCostAssemblyOut, MAX(cost.FinPtdQtyAssemblyOut) as FinPtdQtyAssemblyOut, MAX(p.PACUnitCost) as PACUnitCost, MAX(cost.InventoryID) as InventoryID, MAX(cost.FinPtdQtyAssemblyOut * p.PACUnitCost) as PACIssueCost, MAX(s.SiteID) as SiteID, MAX(isnull(cost.finPtdCostAssemblyOut,0) - (cost.FinPtdQtyAssemblyOut * p.PACUnitCost)) as AssemblyAdjAmount from INItemCostHist cost left join INSite s on cost.CompanyID = s.CompanyID and cost.SiteID = s.SiteID inner join InventoryItem i on cost.CompanyID = i.CompanyID and cost.InventoryID = i.InventoryID left join vPACUnitCost p on cost.CompanyID = p.companyid and cost.InventoryID = p.InventoryID and cost.FinPeriodID = p.FinPeriodID group by cost.FinPeriodID,cost.SiteID,cost.InventoryID,i.ItemClassID,cost.CompanyID
